categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Iego system was a star system located within the Ash Worlds sector in the Outer Rim region of the galaxy which contained the planet Iego, a rogue planetoid in the Extrictarium Nebula with no primary star, but a number of moonlets orbiting it.
During the Clone Wars, the system was visited by Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker during their mission to obtain reeksa root.

Jason Fry confirmed that the Iego and Thousand Moons systems are two different systems. This separation was made due to Anakin and Padmé wearing the Thousand Moons system's fashions while posing as refugees in Attack of the Clones and therefore would not be wearing clothing from a system of legend.
